caption: In an office, a woman was going through some documents. She left the office with a serene expression and encountered another woman carrying a coffee cup. The two women sat on a couch and started talking. Suddenly, a vase fell from above and smashed on the floor in front of them. One woman lay on a bed with a notebook, and another woman sat beside her. They began chatting. Later, a woman in a bathrobe appeared. Three women sat on a couch and had a conversation. Then, another woman in black clothing entered, and all four of them sat on the couch. In a park, a man and a woman sat on a bench. Later, the man took out a wedding ring, and he hurriedly went after the woman. He handed a briefcase to the woman.
